When Israel<S>3478</S> went out<S>3318</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, the house<S>1004</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S> from a people<S>5971</S> of strange language<S>3937</S>;
Judah<S>3063</S> was his sanctuary<S>6944</S>, and Israel<S>3478</S> his dominion<S>4475</S>.
The sea<S>3220</S> saw<S>7200</S> it, and fled<S>5127</S>: Jordan<S>3383</S> was driven<S>5437</S> back<S>268</S>.
The mountains<S>2022</S> skipped<S>7540</S> like rams<S>352</S>, and the little hills<S>1389</S> like lambs<S>1121</S> <S>6629</S>.
What ailed thee, O thou sea<S>3220</S>, that thou fleddest<S>5127</S>? thou Jordan<S>3383</S>, that thou wast driven<S>5437</S> back<S>268</S>?
Ye mountains<S>2022</S>, that ye skipped<S>7540</S> like rams<S>352</S>; and ye little hills<S>1389</S>, like lambs<S>1121</S> <S>6629</S>?
Tremble<S>2342</S>, thou earth<S>776</S>, at the presence<S>6440</S> of the Lord<S>113</S>, at the presence<S>6440</S> of the God<S>433</S> of Jacob<S>3290</S>;
Which turned<S>2015</S> the rock<S>6697</S> into a standing<S>98</S> water<S>4325</S>, the flint<S>2496</S> into a fountain<S>4599</S> of waters<S>4325</S>.
